headline: Denodo Named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Data Integration Tools for Six Consecutive Years
summary: Denodo believes this recognition is due to the strength of its AI capabilities and the loyalty of its diverse customer basePALO ALTO, Calif., Dec. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Denodo, a leader in data management, today announced that Gartner® has positioned the Company as a Leader for the sixth consecutive year in its 2025 Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools. “Data integration tools remain a fundamental architectural component as organizations increasingly seek improved capabilities to sup

headline: RXO Recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Fourth-Party Logistics
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C., December 11, 2025--RXO has been named as a Leader in the inaugural 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Fourth-Party Logistics (4PL). The company was recognized for its Ability to Execute and Completeness of Vision.
